dataQuery.sqlStatement: SELECT DISTINCT TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'fmMonth dd, yyyy') invoice_date, oob.order_base_xid order_number, oref1.ob_refnum_value po_number, TRIM(loc1.location_name) || CHR(13) || (SELECT listagg (TRIM(la.address_line), CHR(13)) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY la.line_sequence) FROM location_address la WHERE la.location_gid = loc1.location_gid) || CHR(13) || loc1.city || ', ' || loc1.province_code || ' ' || loc1.postal_code customer, TRIM(loc2.location_name) || CHR(13) || (SELECT listagg (TRIM(la.address_line), CHR(13)) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY la.line_sequence) FROM location_address la WHERE la.location_gid = loc2.location_gid) || CHR(13) || loc2.city || ', ' || loc2.province_code || ' ' || loc2.postal_code || ' ' || loc2.country_code3_gid destination, oob.inco_term_gid || ' ' || (CASE WHEN loc3.location_gid IS NULL THEN NVL(oob.term_location_text,'Data Missing in System') ELSE TRIM(loc3.location_name) || CHR(13) || (SELECT listagg (TRIM(lad.address_line), CHR(13)) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY lad.line_sequence) FROM location_address lad WHERE lad.location_gid = loc3.location_gid) || CHR(13) || loc3.city || ', ' || loc3.province_code || ' ' || loc3.postal_code || CHR(13) || loc3.country_code3_gid END) inco_terms, oref2.ob_refnum_value pay_terms, orem1.remark_text additional_notes FROM ob_order_base oob INNER JOIN ob_line ol ON oob.order_base_gid = ol.order_base_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_involved_party oip ON oob.order_base_gid = oip.order_base_gid AND oip.involved_party_qual_gid = 'CUSTOMER' LEFT OUTER JOIN location loc1 ON oip.involved_party_contact_gid = loc1.location_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN location loc2 ON ol.dest_location_gid = loc2.location_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN location loc3 ON 'SCOULAR.' || oob.term_location_text = loc3.location_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_refnum oref1 ON oob.order_base_gid = oref1.order_base_gid AND oref1.ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.SHIPPER_PURCHASE_ORDER_NUMBER' LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_refnum oref2 ON oob.order_base_gid = oref2.order_base_gid AND oref2.ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BCO_OB PAYTERM_CUST PAYTERMS' LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_remark orem1 ON oob.order_base_gid = orem1.order_base_gid AND orem1.remark_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.PROFORMA_NOTES' WHERE oob.order_base_gid = :ORDER_BASE_GID

SELECT DISTINCT (CASE WHEN orem.remark_text IS NULL THEN TRIM(TO_CHAR(ROUND(oob.total_weight,0),'999,999,990')) || ' ' || oob.total_weight_uom_code ELSE orem.remark_text || ' ' || oref3.ob_refnum_value END) quantity, item.description, 'USD ' || TRIM(TO_CHAR(ROUND(TO_NUMBER(oref1.ob_refnum_value),2),'$999,999,990.00')) || CHR(13) || 'PER ' || oref2.ob_refnum_value price, TRIM(TO_CHAR(ROUND((CASE WHEN orem.remark_text IS NULL THEN (CASE WHEN oob.total_weight_uom_code = 'LB' OR oob.total_weight_uom_code = 'LBS' THEN oob.total_weight WHEN oob.total_weight_uom_code = 'KG' OR oob.total_weight_uom_code = 'KGS' THEN oob.total_weight * 2.20462262 WHEN oob.total_weight_uom_code = 'ST' OR oob.total_weight_uom_code = 'STON' THEN oob.total_weight * 2000 WHEN oob.total_weight_uom_code = 'MT' OR oob.total_weight_uom_code = 'MTON' THEN oob.total_weight * 2204.62262 WHEN oob.total_weight_uom_code = 'BU' THEN oob.total_weight * (SELECT TO_NUMBER(ir.remark_text) FROM ob_line ol INNER JOIN item it ON ol.packaged_item_gid = it.item_gid INNER JOIN item_remark ir ON it.item_gid = ir.item_gid AND ir.remark_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.POUNDS PER STANDARD UNIT OF MEASURE' WHERE ol.order_base_gid = oob.order_base_gid) ELSE oob.total_weight END) ELSE (CASE WHEN oref3.ob_refnum_value = 'LB' OR oref3.ob_refnum_value = 'LBS' THEN TO_NUMBER(orem.remark_text) WHEN oref3.ob_refnum_value = 'KG' OR oref3.ob_refnum_value = 'KGS' THEN TO_NUMBER(orem.remark_text) * 2.20462262 WHEN oref3.ob_refnum_value = 'ST' OR oref3.ob_refnum_value = 'STON' THEN TO_NUMBER(orem.remark_text) * 2000 WHEN oref3.ob_refnum_value = 'MT' OR oref3.ob_refnum_value = 'MTON' THEN TO_NUMBER(orem.remark_text) * 2204.62262 WHEN oref3.ob_refnum_value = 'BU' THEN TO_NUMBER(orem.remark_text) * (SELECT TO_NUMBER(ir.remark_text) FROM ob_line ol INNER JOIN item it ON ol.packaged_item_gid = it.item_gid INNER JOIN item_remark ir ON it.item_gid = ir.item_gid AND ir.remark_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.POUNDS PER STANDARD UNIT OF MEASURE' WHERE ol.order_base_gid = oob.order_base_gid) ELSE TO_NUMBER(orem.remark_text) END) END) * (CASE WHEN oref2.ob_refnum_value = 'LB' OR oref2.ob_refnum_value = 'LBS' THEN TO_NUMBER(oref1.ob_refnum_value) WHEN oref2.ob_refnum_value = 'KG' OR oref2.ob_refnum_value = 'KGS' THEN TO_NUMBER(oref1.ob_refnum_value) / 2.20462262 WHEN oref2.ob_refnum_value = 'ST' OR oref2.ob_refnum_value = 'STON' THEN TO_NUMBER(oref1.ob_refnum_value) / 2000 WHEN oref2.ob_refnum_value = 'MT' OR oref2.ob_refnum_value = 'MTON' THEN TO_NUMBER(oref1.ob_refnum_value) / 2204.62262 WHEN oref2.ob_refnum_value = 'BU' THEN TO_NUMBER(oref1.ob_refnum_value) / (SELECT TO_NUMBER(ir.remark_text) FROM ob_line ol INNER JOIN item it ON ol.packaged_item_gid = it.item_gid INNER JOIN item_remark ir ON it.item_gid = ir.item_gid AND ir.remark_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.POUNDS PER STANDARD UNIT OF MEASURE' WHERE ol.order_base_gid = oob.order_base_gid) ELSE TO_NUMBER(oref1.ob_refnum_value) END),2),'$999,999,990.00')) total_cost FROM ob_order_base oob INNER JOIN ob_line ol ON oob.order_base_gid = ol.order_base_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN item ON ol.packaged_item_gid = item.item_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_refnum oref1 ON oob.order_base_gid = oref1.order_base_gid AND oref1.ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.CONTRACT_PRICE' LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_refnum oref2 ON oob.order_base_gid = oref2.order_base_gid AND oref2.ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.PRICE_UOM' LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_refnum oref3 ON oob.order_base_gid = oref3.order_base_gid AND oref3.ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.PROFORMA_UOM' LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_remark orem ON oob.order_base_gid = orem.order_base_gid AND orem.remark_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.PROFORMA_NO OF UNITS' WHERE oob.order_base_gid = :ORDER_BASE_GID

SELECT TRIM(TO_CHAR(ROUND(oref1.ob_refnum_value,2),'$999,999,990.00')) freight_cost FROM ob_order_base oob LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_refnum oref1 ON oob.order_base_gid = oref1.order_base_gid AND oref1.ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.PROFORMA_FREIGHT_COST' WHERE oob.order_base_gid = :ORDER_BASE_GID

SELECT TRIM(TO_CHAR(ROUND(orem.remark_text,2),'$999,999,990.00')) misc_cost FROM ob_order_base oob LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_remark orem ON oob.order_base_gid = orem.order_base_gid AND orem.remark_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.PROFORMA_MISC COST' WHERE oob.order_base_gid = :ORDER_BASE_GID

SELECT TRIM(TO_CHAR( (CASE WHEN oref4.order_base_gid IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE ROUND(TO_NUMBER(oref4.ob_refnum_value),2) END) + (CASE WHEN orem2.order_base_gid IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE ROUND(TO_NUMBER(orem2.remark_text),2) END) + ROUND( (CASE WHEN orem1.remark_text IS NULL THEN (CASE WHEN oob.total_weight_uom_code = 'LB' OR oob.total_weight_uom_code = 'LBS' THEN oob.total_weight WHEN oob.total_weight_uom_code = 'KG' OR oob.total_weight_uom_code = 'KGS' THEN oob.total_weight * 2.20462262 WHEN oob.total_weight_uom_code = 'ST' OR oob.total_weight_uom_code = 'STON' THEN oob.total_weight * 2000 WHEN oob.total_weight_uom_code = 'MT' OR oob.total_weight_uom_code = 'MTON' THEN oob.total_weight * 2204.62262 WHEN oob.total_weight_uom_code = 'BU' THEN oob.total_weight * (SELECT TO_NUMBER(ir.remark_text) FROM ob_line ol INNER JOIN item it ON ol.packaged_item_gid = it.item_gid INNER JOIN item_remark ir ON it.item_gid = ir.item_gid AND ir.remark_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.POUNDS PER STANDARD UNIT OF MEASURE' WHERE ol.order_base_gid = oob.order_base_gid) ELSE oob.total_weight END) ELSE (CASE WHEN oref3.ob_refnum_value = 'LB' OR oref3.ob_refnum_value = 'LBS' THEN TO_NUMBER(orem1.remark_text) WHEN oref3.ob_refnum_value = 'KG' OR oref3.ob_refnum_value = 'KGS' THEN TO_NUMBER(orem1.remark_text) * 2.20462262 WHEN oref3.ob_refnum_value = 'ST' OR oref3.ob_refnum_value = 'STON' THEN TO_NUMBER(orem1.remark_text) * 2000 WHEN oref3.ob_refnum_value = 'MT' OR oref3.ob_refnum_value = 'MTON' THEN TO_NUMBER(orem1.remark_text) * 2204.62262 WHEN oref3.ob_refnum_value = 'BU' THEN TO_NUMBER(orem1.remark_text) * (SELECT TO_NUMBER(ir.remark_text) FROM ob_line ol INNER JOIN item it ON ol.packaged_item_gid = it.item_gid INNER JOIN item_remark ir ON it.item_gid = ir.item_gid AND ir.remark_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.POUNDS PER STANDARD UNIT OF MEASURE' WHERE ol.order_base_gid = oob.order_base_gid) ELSE TO_NUMBER(orem1.remark_text) END) END) * (CASE WHEN oref2.ob_refnum_value = 'LB' OR oref2.ob_refnum_value = 'LBS' THEN TO_NUMBER(oref1.ob_refnum_value) WHEN oref2.ob_refnum_value = 'KG' OR oref2.ob_refnum_value = 'KGS' THEN TO_NUMBER(oref1.ob_refnum_value) / 2.20462262 WHEN oref2.ob_refnum_value = 'ST' OR oref2.ob_refnum_value = 'STON' THEN TO_NUMBER(oref1.ob_refnum_value) / 2000 WHEN oref2.ob_refnum_value = 'MT' OR oref2.ob_refnum_value = 'MTON' THEN TO_NUMBER(oref1.ob_refnum_value) / 2204.62262 WHEN oref2.ob_refnum_value = 'BU' THEN TO_NUMBER(oref1.ob_refnum_value) / (SELECT TO_NUMBER(ir.remark_text) FROM ob_line ol INNER JOIN item it ON ol.packaged_item_gid = it.item_gid INNER JOIN item_remark ir ON it.item_gid = ir.item_gid AND ir.remark_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.POUNDS PER STANDARD UNIT OF MEASURE' WHERE ol.order_base_gid = oob.order_base_gid) ELSE TO_NUMBER(oref1.ob_refnum_value) END),2),'$999,999,990.00')) total_amount FROM ob_order_base oob LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_refnum oref1 ON oob.order_base_gid = oref1.order_base_gid AND oref1.ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.CONTRACT_PRICE' LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_refnum oref2 ON oob.order_base_gid = oref2.order_base_gid AND oref2.ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.PRICE_UOM' LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_refnum oref3 ON oob.order_base_gid = oref3.order_base_gid AND oref3.ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.PROFORMA_UOM' LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_refnum oref4 ON oob.order_base_gid = oref4.order_base_gid AND oref4.ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.PROFORMA_FREIGHT_COST' LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_remark orem1 ON oob.order_base_gid = orem1.order_base_gid AND orem1.remark_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.PROFORMA_NO OF UNITS' LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_remark orem2 ON oob.order_base_gid = orem2.order_base_gid AND orem2.remark_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.PROFORMA_MISC COST' WHERE oob.order_base_gid = :ORDER_BASE_GID
